mapper.select: select *,(${currentTime} between events.start_time - 600000 and events.start_time + events.duration) as isLive from events;
select *,(${currentTime} between events.start_time - 600000 and events.start_time + events.duration) as isLive from events where id =${eventId} ;
select *,(${currentTime} between events.start_time - 600000 and events.start_time + events.duration) as isLive, (${currentTime} < events.start_time - 600000) as isUpcoming from events;

select *,(${currentTime} between events.start_time - 600000 and events.start_time + events.duration) as isLive,(${currentTime} > events.start_time + events.duration) as isUpcoming from events where id =${eventId} ;
